author: tellison
msg: Recent PDE builds can now find bundles directly in target dir

author: andreas
msg: Refactored patch system for cocoon.xconf. Patch files are now gathered in build/temp/patch and not copied to the build directory. Usecase patches were removed from cocoon-xconf.xsl. I have replaced remove=... with unless=... to reduce build time, feel free to complain.

author: andreas
msg: Throw appropriate exception if workflow variable does not exist

author: jgmyers
msg: Bug 4636: Make charset normalization enabled by the normalize_charset config option

author: andreas
msg: Fixed handling of is_live workflow variable in Overview usecase
